title.en: How do you want to install Owncast?

instructions.en:
By using the installer you can get up and running in about a minute. However, if you would prefer to download a release manually, use a one-click install at a supported hosting provider, use a container you have those options and more.

If you'd prefer you can browse our entire installation documentation.

title.en: How would you like to manually install Owncast?

instructions.en: Owncast supplies a quick install script that will always install the most recent version and get you running very quickly. However, there are other options.

text.en: I want to use the Owncast Quick Installer Script.
I want to download a release of Owncast.
I want to use my operating system's package manager.

title.en: What hosting provider would you like to use to install Owncast for you?

instructions.en: Owncast is supported on the following hosting providers and they can install Owncast for you.

text.en: Linode
DigitalOcean
Vultr
Zeus Cloud
Elestio (Fully managed)
Hetzner

title.en: Use your Operating System's package manager.

instructions.en:
Note: These packages may be out of date. These packages are not built or maintained by the Owncast project and any specific concerns or support regarding their installation should be directed at the maintainers of the packages.

What Operating System or distribution do you use?
